documents.document: The travel ban is so blatant, heinous, + legally challengeable, I wonder: While we're consumed w this, what else's happening in #WhiteHouse?
Support @ACLU, #humanrights, donate: https://t.co/VH0QecdpHK
@NickAxelrod Over the last 2 wks, I'm alternating between blocking out news and crying over it. You know it's tough to make me cry.

Overheard, #3 bus, 2 kids ~ age 10: 1: If I was your mum, would you hump me or kill me? 2: Dude, stop saying that! 1: Pick one!!

Tomorrow: Unwelcome Chevron/Statoil from Aotearoa's waters! #whywellington #climateaction #stopdeepseaoil https://t.co/SjY4zgAPSH
@linds_bot,come over for a visit or more. Important to recognise you're a visitor and it's mana whenua's land. I reckon you got that.
@linds_bot @meCatarina That said, I feel bailing was much easier than staying. I really appreciate ppl back home fighting the good fight.
@linds_bot @meCatarina All expats get away from sth. A privilege we may learn from + relish. The ability to move is great, as is NZ.
@nobbsly Thank you for being there. I appreciate it. xx

My absentee ballot's in the post, and I'm not watching #debate because I like myself. Going for a walk in the sun before I get back to work.
@kirbymekler Kia kaha. We are changing the world, and that is very frightening for some.
@AprilHathcock Well, it's quite a haul! But it's also a special, beautiful place. Gotta make my way back to NYC sometime. :)

@Megapope Not even, that foam face is my face. It's a portrait of myself and coffee IN ONE. 😮 I am coffee, coffee is me, etc.
